column4: Hey how can i tell if i have SSH Running i want to be able to ssh into my computer ???
ps aux | grep sshd
So if it outputs something that means its good to go ? i just have to open up port 22 and login ?
what are u trying to do ?
SSH into computer from another computer
When i try from inside it says connection refused
enable sshd daemon on the other machine and then try to ssh
other machine was windows and was running putty
putty is just an utility to connect to the linux box, I dunno what are u trying to do?
im trying to SSH with putty from one computer into my linux box
How do i enable sshd and also sudo iptables -F outputs nothing
It will not output anything coz this temporary disables the firewall
kazuki   *BLOCK* 0.0  0.0   *BLOCK*   796 pts/1    R+   11:21   0:00 grep sshd    is what it outputs *BLOCKED* was by me
How do i start up the deamon ?
please pick up a linux book and study the basics
/etc/init.d/sshd start
thank you
make sure u buy a linux book and read
i am learning slowly i just need this working because i got to leave and have to use it. bash: /etc/init.d/sshd: No such file or directory
sudo apt-get install openssh-server
Thanks it works :D
